componentType.description: A required value to indicate the component type. For matching, this must be 'corespring-match'.

correctResponse.description: An object describing the correct responses for the component.

id.description: The identifier of the row whose correct choices the object describes.

matchSet.description: An ordered array of booleans, whose value corresponds to the column's correctness.

allowPartialScoring.description: If there is more than one correct answer to this question, you may allow partial credit based on the number of correct answers submitted.

partialScores.description: An object which keys the id of the matching row to a percentage value corresponding to the weight to award it in the overall score.

properties.description: Describes the feedback to be displayed to the user when the interaction is submitted.

summaryFeedback.description: Overall feedback to be displayed to the user when the interaction is submitted.

columns.description: An array of objects describing the columns of the match interaction.

labelHtml.description: The label to be displayed for each column of the interaction.

rows.description: An array of objects describing the rows of the match interaction.

id.description: An identifier for each row of the interaction. Used to specify correctness.

labelHtml.description: The label to be displayed for each row of the interaction.

answerType.description: An enum describing the type of answer available in the match interaction.

title.description: A title for the interaction, displayed in the editor.
